com.palantir.giraffe.host

Interface HostControlSystem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHostControlSystem

    public interface HostControlSystem
extends Closeable
    Combines a file system and an execution system for a local or remote host.

    HostControlSystems are open on creation and should be closed after use. Clients should not close the underlying systems individually.
